data.actual_result: The Discord taskbar icon does not flash
data.expected_result: The Discord taskbar icon should flash
data.short_description: "Enable Taskbar Flashing" does nothing if "Enable Desktop Notifications" is disabled.
data.steps_to_repro: - In "Settings", within the "Notifications" section, enable "Enable Taskbar Flashing" and disable "Enable Desktop Notifications" - Receive a DM and notice there is no flashing on the taskbar.
